github_file_added: A user added a file to a GitHub repo in a project
github_file_removed: A user removed a file in a GitHub repo in a project
github_file_updated: A user updated a file in a GitHub repo in a project
github_folder_created: A user created a folder in a GitHub repo in a project
github_node_authorized: A user authorized the GitHub addon for a project
github_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the GitHub addon for a project
github_node_deauthorized_no_user: GitHub addon for a project deauthorized
github_repo_linked: A user linked a GitHub repo in a project
